column4: hi all, pls could someone assist me, for 2 days now my empathy cannot connect to msn. i have tried several things suggested about telepathy-butterfly and it's not working, cannot find any other help anywhere
idk, but pidgin is what i use and i haven't had any problems, so i suggest you try.
i think there is an option for it log itself in the messenger, try finding it. might help. ;)
